title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Simplify permissions management across Amazon Redshift warehouses (ANT350)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 简化 Amazon Redshift 数据仓库的权限管理 (ANT350)
abstract: As organizations scale their analytics infrastructure, they deploy multiple Amazon Redshift clusters for workload isolation, cost attribution, and performance optimization. For each new cluster, teams must create databases linked to each data share and recreate permission policies locally. This fragmented approach becomes unmanageable as more clusters are brought online. Join us to learn how Amazon Redshift Federated Permissions removes this permission management complexity by providing centralized governance across multiple warehouses.
abstract_cn: 随着组织扩展其分析基础设施，他们会部署多个Amazon Redshift集群以实现工作负载隔离、成本归属和性能优化。对于每个新集群，团队必须创建与每个数据共享链接的数据库，并在本地重新创建权限策略。随着更多集群上线，这种分散的方法变得难以管理。加入我们，了解Amazon Redshift联合权限如何通过在多个数据仓库之间提供集中治理来消除这种权限管理复杂性。
